document_data.name: Iron Edge
document_data.mainbody: The '''Iron Edge''' was an adventuring company active within the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
Active members of the Iron Edge met every year in the city of [[Daggerford]] to celebrate the birthday of [[Bronwyn Daggerford]] who joined them for several years to hone her [[magic]]al skills and earn her fortune.

Many of the original members of the group later retired to [[Waterdeep]], [[Secomber]], and [[Ruathym (city)|Ruathym]].
